paper_abstract: We propose a new authentication scheme of binding update protocol, which its Correspondent Node (CN) issues a ticket to Mobile Node (MN) when MN first executes the Binding Update (BU). This ticket assist that it is able to do efficiently the BU whenever MN requires the BU for the future. The proposed protocol need not be repeated equal BU course whenever the MN moves to foreign link or network, and is able to be executed in environment of not operating the Home Agent (HA), and also easies scalability.
paper_title: A new authentication scheme of binding update protocol on handover in mobile IPv6 networks
